article.headline: Centenary 69, S. Dakota St. 64
article.story: BROOKINGS, S.D. (AP) -- Nick Stallings scored 22 points and Tyrone Hamilton added 16 as Centenary snapped a 10-game losing streak with a 69-64 win over South Dakota State Saturday in the Summit League. Centenary (10-20, 4-14) led 32-31 at the half and shot 50 percent in the second half. SDSU (8-21, 3-15) couldn't muster enough offense to make a run, shooting just 29 percent in the second half and 33 percent for the game. SDSU lost its last five games to close out its season. The Jackrabbits are not eligible for the Summit League tournament until next season. Kai Williams and Ben Beran had double-doubles for the Jackrabbits. Williams had 15 points and 13 rebounds and Beran added 12 points and 13 rebounds. Garrett Callahan added 13 points and Dale Moss chipped in 11. SDSU outrebounded the Gents 49-32

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
